text: Kossuth Lajos tér (Lajos Kossuth Square) is a station on the M2 (East-West) line of the Budapest Metro. It is located south of Lajos Kossuth Square in Pest, immediately on the left bank of the Danube river. The station was open on 22 December 1972 as part of the extension of the line from Deák Ferenc tér to Déli pályaudvar. ==Connections== *25px Tram **2 Jászai Mari tér – Közvágóhíd *25px Trolleybus **70 Erzsébet királyné útja, aluljáró – Kossuth Lajos tér **78 Keleti pályaudvar (Garay utca) – Kossuth Lajos tér **CITY Fővám tér – Lehel tér *20px Bus: 15, 115 *20px 18px 18px ==Gallery== File:Budapešť 0747.jpg| File:Kossuth Lajos ter man with dog.JPG| File:Budapest, Kossuth Lajos tér, metró 2.jpg ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Metro stations in Budapest Category:Railway stations opened in 1973
